item.description:
Hey Girls,

I've received a number of e-mails requesting for more after-work events. For those of you who have no been to the Hawthorne, it is inside Hotel Commonwealth at 500 A Commonwealth Avenue in Kenmore Square. It is an upscale lounge so dress to impress! I will send out my number as the event comes closer. I hope to see many of you there!
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet in front of Hotel Commonwealth and I will give out my number when the event is closer
item.name: Drinks at The Hawthorne
